name: Riserva del caos
desc:
Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin Drake.

Ruin Drakes can absorb Elemental Energy from the outside and store it in this component inside their "neck."

value.text:
Dropped by Ruin Drakes
Stardust Exchange

customize.name: Drago delle rovine Guardiano della terra
customize.desc:
A horrifying dragon-shaped machine.

It is said to be a war machine left behind by a now-destroyed nation. It mimics the appearance of the beings known as Vishaps, with some functional enhancements. Such machines have an even greater ability to "absorb" — or perhaps the right word is "counteract" — elemental powers than the vishaps.

From this ability, one can glimpse the scale of the ambition that the civilization that made these machines must have once held...

customize.name: Drago delle rovine Guardiano dei cieli
customize.desc:
A horrifying dragon-shaped machine.

It is said to be a war machine left behind by a now-destroyed nation. It mimics the appearance of the beings known as Vishaps, with some functional enhancements. Such machines have an even greater ability to "absorb" — or perhaps the right word is "counteract" — elemental powers than the vishaps.

How, you wonder, did a civilization that could make such frightening machines of war collapse?

customize.name: Bastone delle sabbie scarlatte
customize.desc: Uno degli esemplari di una coppia di scettri forgiati in ossidiana. Leggenda vuole che questi bastoni dessero la facoltà di guidare le popolazioni del deserto, ma nessun servitore attualmente in vita è in grado d'identificare queste insegne regali.

customize.name: Trafiggiluna
customize.desc: Un'arma che hai ottenuto da una storia degli Aranara. Ha la forma di una grande freccia e può essere usata come fosse una lancia.

customize.name: Acquamarina di Makhaira
customize.desc: Un antico spadone che luccica come l'acqua. Mille anni di erosione da parte della sabbia non hanno minimamente intaccato la sua lama inverosimilmente affilata.

customize.name: Gloria della foresta
customize.desc: Un'arma che hai ottenuto da una storia degli Aranara. Ha assunto la forma di uno spadone in grado di fendere i nemici della foresta.

customize.name: Lama di alburno
customize.desc: Un'arma che hai ottenuto da una storia degli Aranara. Ha assunto la forma di una lama in grado di fendere i nemici della foresta.

customize.name: Modulo del caos
customize.desc:
Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin Drake.

The dragons were once the most primitive and ancient bodily form of the supreme elements until they were defeated, conquered, or assimilated.

customize.desc: Moneta comune. La lingua compresa da tutti.

customize.name: Polvere stellare senza padrone
customize.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

customize.name: Modulo del caos
customize.desc:
Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin Drake.

The dragons were once the most primitive and ancient bodily form of the supreme elements until they were defeated, conquered, or assimilated.

customize.name: Bullone del caos
customize.desc:
Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin Drake.

Among the lost ancient kingdoms, there was a group of people who were obsessed with the idea of mimesis. Be it the Hypostases' pure ordered elements or the ancient primitive power of the dragons, these people believed that they might all be replicated and modified to the point where they had surpassed their natural counterparts.

By this means, a superior and unsullied bodily form could replace the continuously decaying and shattering order.
